title: Account banned due to Toxicity. I have not played in a year or so...
body: I just logged on to find that my account had been banned with the chat log attached. If you look into my previous chats from the IP i logged in from in my city that I can provide for you, you'll notice that I do not speak that way. My account was compromised and It feels really unfair that I've been banned for it. if there is any way I can go through some sort of process to prove I did not do what i was banned for, I would be super happy. I invested a lot of  time and money into this account and I really don't want to lose it.

replies.body:
Hey SDamonS!

Just as A Bagelle has stated, you can write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If your account was compromised during the time, our Player Behavior Specialists should be able to help you out!
You can also submit a support ticket where they will gladly help you there :D
